statements.query: MATCH (human:Human), (guser:GoogleWorkspaceUser) WHERE human.email = guser.email MERGE (human)-[r:IDENTITY_GOOGLEWORKSPACE]->(guser) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
MATCH (:Human)-[r:IDENTITY_GOOGLEWORKSPACE]->(:GoogleWorkspaceUser) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

name: Google Workspace user map to Human
